Text:
Do you take requests?

I would appreciate if you could find me 
"Strategic Planning:What every manager must know" George Albert Steiner.

"Strategic Supply Chain Management" by Shoshanah Cohen & Joseph Roussel 

"How to Win Friends and Influence People" Dale Carnage

Thanks
Sorry, I don't "specialise" in these. Try other torrent sites/search engines (their names are stupidly banned here) and finally Google. Choose your keywords carefully. Good luck.
Thanks for this great book.The concepts have been explained in a very lucid manner.
